definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: sling;—abs. ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 17:50, [[כַּף הַקָָּלַע]] 1Sa 25:29 hollow of the sling (fig.); sf.[[קַלְעוֹ]] 1Sa 17:40; [[אַבְנֵי־קָָלַע]] Job 41:20 sling-stones, so [[קְלָעִים]] ´[[א]]: 2Ch 26:14; [[־קֶלַע]]´[[א]]: Zec 9:15 is difficult: Marti:Kau ´[[־ק]]:´[[כְּא]]:; We Now ´[[בְּנֵי ק]]: sons of—?
